entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who has been loyal to the Black family. He is expected home by Harry and Hermione but receives Yaxley instead.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a Death Eater who arrives at Grimmauld Place in place of Kreacher.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character and is worried about Kreacher's safety.

relationships.description: Yaxley replaces Kreacher at Grimmauld Place.
Harry is concerned about Kreacher's safety and well-being.
